name: VATC Sleep Pod - Terminal 2
address: 2nd floor, Terminal 2, Noi Bai International Airport, Noi Bai Airport, Hanoi, Vietnam, 10000
hotelDesc:
Offering quality accommodations in the culture, business district of Hanoi, VATC Sleep Pod - Terminal 2 is a popular pick for both business and leisure travelers. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

At VATC Sleep Pod - Terminal 2, the excellent service and superior facilities make for an unforgettable stay. While lodging at this wonderful property, guests can enjoy 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, 24-hour front desk, Wi-Fi in public areas.

VATC Sleep Pod - Terminal 2 is home to 6 bedrooms. All are tastefully furnished and many even provide such comforts as television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, non smoking rooms, air conditioning, wake-up service. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Whatever your reason for visiting Hanoi, the VATC Sleep Pod - Terminal 2 is the perfect venue for an exhilarating and exciting break away.
